why: Invited guest talk on Tree mortality modelling in East Texas Forests using Fores Inventory and Analysis Data
Invited guest talk on Evaluating extreme drought-induced tree mortality and biomass loss in east Texas using Forest Inventory and Analysis (FIA) data
Invited guest talk on Geospatial distribution of drought and drought- induced tree mortality in the east Texas, USA: an implication for sustainable forest management
Presented on Needs and gaps, regional networking and collaboration for ways to adopt innovative geospatial technologies for forest fire monitoring and management
